title: some technical problems
body: so i have been playing league on my new PC for about a year now and i haven't experienced anything, its all been smooth. then about 3-4 months ago i stopped playing due to some issues whenever i play league. like my screen would go black, some buzzing noises would happen and my PC would re boot. i tried playing after a couple of months and the problem is still there, is it a memory prob? iv'e also tried uninstalling LOL and re installing several times, neither of them work. what do i do?

replies.body:
You've been pretty patient with this issue happening for a while now, and glad you reached out to us.  Honestly, it sounds like there might be a pretty severe issue with your PC that's causing your PC to shut off in an act of self preservation.  The most common cause of this is overheating, so double check your air vents and make sure it has solid air flow.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well and our tech team can take a closer look into what's going on.  See you there!
